#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{int op=0;
    int t;
int sum=0;
int po;
    int a[10000],res[10][4001]={(0,0)}; 
    int n,i,j,temp,m,x;
	int times,time;
 
    scanf("%d",&t);
       // initializes digit counter
 
       temp = 0;
	   int iu=2;
		while(iu<=9)
		{sum=0;
		times=0;
a[0]=1;  
       m=1; 
	  for(i=iu;times<=4000;times++)
       {
            for(j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
               x = a[j]*i+temp; //x contains the digit by digit product
               a[j]=x%10; //Contains the digit to store in position j
               temp = x/10; //Contains the carry value that will be stored on later indexes
            }
             while(temp>0) //while loop that will store the carry value on array.
             { 
               a[m]=temp%10;
               temp = temp/10;
               m++; // increments digit counter
             }
			 for(po=m-1;po>=0;po--) 
              sum+=a[po];
//printf("%d\n",sum);
			  res[i][times]=sum;
sum=0;
      }
	  iu++;
	  }
	while(t--)
    {sum=0;
op++;
       scanf("%d",&n);
	   scanf("%d",&time);
if(n==1)
{
printf("Case %d: 1\n",op);
continue;
} 
if(time==0)
{
printf("Case %d: 1\n",op);
continue;
}
else
printf("Case %d: %d\n",op,res[n][time-1]);
  
    }
    return 0;
}
